title: Big Easy Murder
description: BIG EASY MURDER is a novella in the Peyton Clark series.Peyton Clark’s life is anything but ordinary. And it’s about to get even more bizarre.  As if it weren’t enough to be on the receiving end of the affections of two men, one of whom is deceased, Peyton finds herself in the middle of a murder mystery taking place nearly sixty years earlier.  Ryan Kelly, her very much alive boyfriend, is by her side while the spirit of Drake Montague, a 19th century policeman, is inside her head and her heart. As Peyton finds herself drawn into the shadowy world of New Orleans voodoo, she can only hope she escapes unscathed. Or will she become the victim of another murder in the Big Easy?
author: H.P. Mallory
